1.content:
Your name is Tom Simmons a young, extremely talented scientist/engineer who's spent his life researching and developing portal technology. You had always been fascinated with the concept of teleportation ever since you were a child. After many years of painstaking trial and error, you finished development of your life’s work, or at least a prototype.

Within your very basement, you had built a large circular room with two circular portal hatches; one on the ceiling and one on the floor directly below it. These were not small hatches; each was about roughly the size of a large above-ground pool, taking up around 90% of the room’s radius. Along the parameter of the room was a walkway needed to access the control consoles, which were specifically created for the experiment. The room itself was your invention.

After many days of calibrating the room, you were finally able to start it up for testing!

Which portal should you test out first?
1.title: Brief introduction

11.content:
The massive hatch on the ceiling began to open with a loud low grind. A bright light shined through the space between the metal doors as they split from each other. As the space between them grew larger, it was easier to make out the bluish swirling vortex that was slowly filling up the ceiling. With a thud, the doors finished opening to completion.

“Looking good so far.." You muttered in awe as you stared up at the incredible portal.

Your next task was to create a secondary portal to connect it with. With your control monitor, you could create another ‘portable’ portal anywhere within a mile radius. In order to test-view the second portal properly within your lab, you needed to make it significantly smaller than the ‘home’ portal; you simply hadn't accommodated enough room for a third full sized portal within the relatively small space.

After entering the specific coordinates, you slapped the enter key.

Nearly a foot away from you, a foot-long circular portal appeared a few steps away. With its arrival, the swirling [home] vortex across the ceiling suddenly went still; almost as if the waves of a raging ocean were suddenly made flat as a mirror. The two portals had been connected. As you stared into the smaller portal in front of you, It was almost as if you were looking at a monitor that was recording the entire lab from above.

“Amazing…..It really worked. It’s a success!” You were beside yourself with pride.

The only thing left to test was if objects can enter and exit safely. In order test this; you needed to send the secondary portal outside and resize it again. The specific area you intended to send it to was in your back yard where you had set up a large closed-in tent capable of fitting the full-sized version. At the top of the tent was a robotic arm that would drop an apple, which would (if everything went correctly) fall through the ceiling portal, into the lab.

"Alright...here we go.." Your hands shook with anticipation.

In all of your excitement, you accidentally created a typo in the coordinates. Without even thinking to double-check, you hit enter. It didn't take long for you to realize something was off. You stared up at the ceiling of your lab, only to see blue sky.

“What….? This isn't the tent…” It was then that you realized your mistake.

“Damn, I guess I'm more nervous than I thought” You muttered embarrassingly as you began to fix the coordinates.

Suddenly, an error dialog box popped up on screen. None of the commands you were entering seemed to be recognized. You remembered that you had not originally calibrated the test-program to send a portal anywhere but the tent. Entering the wrong coordinates seems to have created a bug in the system.

“Damn it, I was so close!" You brought your fists down in disappointment

"Oh well.....” You sighed as you quickly begun to fix the issue in order to continue the experiment.

"Nothing a few minutes of reprogramming can't fix..."

Not having given it any thought, you had totally forgotten that you still needed to resize the portal.
11.title: Tests the ceiling portal

111.content:
-In the yard nextdoor

The kid neighbor next-door was playing alone in his back yard. Joey had friends, it was just too late in the day to play with them, and everyone seemed too busy to come over. The boy stood on his cement porch, bouncing a small rubber ball to pass the time.

"Soooo boooored" Joey whined to himself.

Suddenly, the ball accidentally hit the side of his house after a hard throw. Joey watched as his ball bounced from the wall, into the yard.
“awhh, maaaaan” he sighed.

Stepping off his porch, he began his mini expedition to find where the ball had landed within the medium-sized yard. Fortunately, It didn't take long before he spotted it, nestled in the grass only a few feet away. After reaching down and picking it up, something else caught his attention. In the corner of his yard, he noticed something weird. It was like something was floating off of the ground, like a frisbi, only a little bit larger.

Tempted by curiosity, the boy began to venture towards it. He stopped a few feet away, just to be safe. He realized it was perfectly flat; Almost like a mirror, only it wasn't reflecting anything. Pushing aside his fears, he took a few steps closer until he stood right next to it. It was floating about a foot off the ground, a little lower than his knees.

Joey stared down curiously into the strange image within the circle.

“What…is this thing…?” the boy thought to himself with confusion.

Slowly, he lowered himself to the ground, sitting on his knees in order to get a closer inspection. As he brought his face right next to the flat surface, his eyes suddenly grew wide with amazement.

It was like a weird metal bowl inside. Even more shocking was that he could see what looked like a man. It seemed like the man couldn't see him, since he was facing what looked like a computer of some sort. The boy just continued to stare with his mouth slightly ajar. He couldn't make sense of what he was looking at. What was this thing? A floating tablet?

No longer able to contain his growing curiosity, Joey slowly lifted his hand, preparing to poke the surface. The boy gulped as he lowered his finger. To his amazement, it passed right through the surface. It was as if there wasn't a surface at all!!! It was like a hole in the middle of the air! He pulled his finger out for a moment, before poking it back in.

“Coooooool…” He muttered in amazement

Growing more curious by the moment, He then brought his attention back to the tiny man. Holding his breath, he brought his entire hand down into the hole.

“Woah..” Joey muttered as he compared the size of his hand to the man next to it.

“He’s so tiny…” The boy continued to just stare, thinking to himself quietly, his hand hanging motionless in he hole behind the man.

Suddenly snapping back to reality, Joey pulled out his hand and sat up straight. Cautiously, the boy turned his head, looking across his yard, as to see if anyone had been watching. He was still all alone in the fenced in yard. Turning his attention back to the hole, he stared blankly for a moment before a playful and sneaky expression formed on his face. He began to reach back in, only this time with a goal. He opened his hand wide as he reached for the tiny man.
111.title: Somewhere nextdoor

choices: Joey wants to keep you a secret
1111.content:
You were only a few keystrokes away from fixing the error before something felt off. You paused for a moment as you suddenly felt a presence behind you. Turning your head, your heart sank in fear. Encompassing your entire vision was a massive hand. Without even collecting your thoughts, you bolted towards the door. Before your could make it two steps, the gigantic fingers had encompassed you, pulling you into the massive bare palm. You struggled desperately as your entire body was pressed against the soft warm surface.

What was happening? Everything was happening too quickly to comprehend.

Then, just as it had begun, there was nothing. The fingers that had been pressed against your back were now gone. You felt a cool breeze and smelled fresh cut grass.

“Wh-where…” You lifted your head only to be hit with a horrifying sight. You were outside. Across the vast fleshy palm was what looked like an enormous back yard. Lifting your head, you were met with the most shocking realization of all. High up above was the huge smiling face of a young boy. It took you a moment to recognize him as your neighbor's kid. You had occasionally seen him playing out in his front yard with a few of his friends, but you've never actually been introduced by his parents.

“Cooooool” Joey brought his palm up to eye level, inspecting your tiny form. The young boy's warm breath washed over you, smelling of apple juice.

His hazel eyes were terrifyingly enormous as they focused in.

It was then that you noticed the secondary portal over the side of the hand. Everything clicked.

Knowing that you needed to regain your composure, you attempted to balance yourself, ready to speak.

“h-HEY!” Joey’s eyes widened with surprise that you spoke.

“K-Kid! I need you to put me back in there!!” You pointed at the portal.

Joey just continued to stare for a moment, amazed that the tiny man could talk. He wasn't sure if you had actually just been a tiny action figure or something. It hadn't occurred to him that you might actually be a real person.

“How come you’re so little?” The boy asked curiously

“I’m your next door neighbor! I was conducting an experiment and there was an accident! I need you to put me back into that portal!”

“Portal?” The boy asked, staring at the hole in space. “Wait, you live next door?” The boy turned his head towards the fence to his left.

“Yes! I know your parents!” Your voice was starting to get tired.

“oh…” There was an odd, almost dissapointed tone to the boy's voice.

“Look! I really need you to put me back! The portal won’t last much longer before it needs to shut down!”

Joey looked deep in thought.
1111.title: Grabs him

11111.content:
“Alright” Joey felt a pinch of disappointment. He kinda wished this could last a little longer, it was all so fun and exciting. It’s not every day he would get to hold a tiny person in the palm of his hand.

Closing his fingers around you, Joey slowly lowered his hand back down into the portal.

Just as his fist reached floor-level, he paused for a moment.

You could see through the fingers that you were back in the lab, but you were still waiting for the boy to let you go.

“Why is he? -...”

Suddenly your view of the lab plummeted as you were brought back up through the portal.

“Hey! What are you doing?!” You yelled.

“Hold on! I want to take a picture of you! I want to prove to my friends at school that this really happened!”

“No! I told you I don’t have much ti- “ The boys fingers closed around you once again

“It will only take a minute!” The boy smiled to himself as he stood up and ran towards his house.

“STOP! Go back!” Your muffled screams were hardly audible outside the boy’s closed fist. You watched as the portal get further and further away between the boy's giant fingers.

Joey ran up to the porch and grabbed his phone. He opened his palm and aimed to take a picture;

*click*

“Okay! Now take me back!” You yelled

‘…um... just one more!”

*click*

“PLEASE! Now!” you screamed

"Okay!" The boy smiled. He seemed content with his evidence pictures as he hit the 'send' button so all his friends could see.

Without much urgency, Joey walked back to the portal.

You were really getting tired of this kid. You were also silently debating whether or not to tell his parents about all this.

Just as Joey was two steps away from the portal, suddenly.

*ZOoOOop*

A strange humming noise emanated from the portal before the circle quickly shrunk out of existence.

You felt your stomach drop

“No…..!”

Though you weren't paying attention, Joey’s expression slowly changed from one of genuine shock to one of excitement.

You felt the hand slowly raise until you could feel the familiar warm breath wash over you.

“Hey! Now you can stay this way!” The boy smiled widely

“STAY?! What? No! You need to tell your parents!”

"You can be my new toy now!” Joey’s smile widened as his fingers began to close over you.

“Toy!? What?! W-wait!! No STOP!!” The last thing you see before the darkness engulfs you is the boy’s greedy smile.

Joey lowers his hand and stuffs you into his pants pockets.
11111.title: Joey Decides to..

111112.content:
THUMP THUMP THUMP All you could hear was the boy's footsteps thumping as he ran. Inside his pocket, you swayed back and forth with each long stride. It was dark, and warmer than you expected in here. "I have to get out of here. I have to get away!" You think to yourself desperately. The walls seemed too high to climb, and the smooth material of the pocket was horrible for climbing, offering no grip at all. Even if you could climb, the constant rocking motion would just knock you down again. You sighed as you sat at the bottom of his pocket.

Finally, light engulfs your dark world, and 5 long fingers reach in and wrap around you. The boy lifts you out of his pocket, and you're glad when you get a face full of fresh air again. For a moment, you studied your surroundings. The boy's massive fingers wrapped around you tightly, squeezing your body uncomfortably tight. His fingers were slightly dirty, no doubt from playing outside. Above you, his boyish face loomed, huge eyes staring at you with a mixture of curiosity and excitement. A warm gust of wind blew over you as the boy's lips parted slightly, and he breathed the word "Whoooooaaaah!" again, still amazed at his new toy.

"Hey, kid! Let me go!" You yell. It was bad enough you were stuck at this size, you didn't want to be handled by some kid. Joey smirks at you, thinking for a moment. "You're my new toy now! We're going to have so much fun!"

"I'm NOT your toy, kid! Now, go find your parents, and tell them what happened! I need their help if I'm going to get back to normal!"

Joey looked at you, his bright smile drooping a bit. "No way! If I tell Mom and Dad, they'll take you away from me! I want to keep you! I found you, so it's only fair that you belong to me!" The boy looked triumphant. In his mind, he was correct. You weren't an adult, you were far too small. You were a living, breathing toy that he could do whatever he wanted with. He found you, and that makes you his property.

Joey places you on the hard wood floor, and goes over to a box in the corner. He digs out a bunch of other toys, action figures, large toy cars, nothing out of the ordinary for a young boy, you thought. As the boy was distracted pulling toys out to play with, the thought of escaping ran through your mind. Joey had closed his door, and locked it, but you might be able to slip right under the door. Surely, you could find help then. As you pondered your escape, you're suddenly snapped back to reality by a loud barking noise. "Crap, this kid has a dog..." You shudder to yourself as you picture a set of huge, slobbering dog jaws coming down on you if the dog decided you looked like a tasty if curious morsel. "Maybe I should stay here for now..." You think to yourself.

Joey's socked foot slams down behind you, and you snap around to face him. "OK, play time, little toy!" Joey says, a smile spread across his face.
111112.title: Brought Home

1111121.content:
Joey dumped some toys down, the plastic figures slamming down around you. You ducked and covered your head as they toys fell. Finally, Joey plopped down, sitting cross legged in front of you. He picked up an action figure, some kind of army man figurine from the looks of it. "OK, you're the bad guy, and I'm going to stop you!" Joey says, and slams the action figure down in front of you.

*THUD THUD* the plastic figurine slams against the floor as Joey slowly brings it closer to you. "J...Joey, stop this!" You scream as the plastic toy gets closer and closer. It's clear Joey won't stop, and you turn, and run. "You can't get away!" Joey says in a slightly deeper voice, and brings the toy down on top of you, slamming you to the ground. Your head aches and spins as you lie pinned under the toy. Joey then brings it up, and slams it down on you again, the boots of the toy slamming down on your chest over and over. "OOF! OOF! AAGH!" You yelp each time. "Joey! Please, stop!" You beg, but the boy doesn't stop. He can't understand the harm he's causing you. He has no idea how fragile your tiny body is.

Joey grabs you up, and slams you against the action figure as he pretends you're locked in a fierce battle. Your arms flail around, like a rag doll as the rough giant boy squeezes you, crashes you against toys, and the floor, and humiliates you. You never dreamed you'd be in the hands of such a young boy, literally one of his toys.

Finally, Joey tosses the plastic action figure to the side. "OK, now we're going to play a different game! I'm going to be the giant, and you're going to have to avoid me!" Joey stands to his full height, one socked foot on either side of you. Without warning, Joey lifts a foot over you, the slightly dirty sole of the boy's socked foot looming high above. Panic sunk in, and pure adrenaline coursed through your body. You got to your feet, and ran, as fast as you could, just before a loud THUMP shook the floor behind you. He would have really crushed you! He has no idea what he's doing! You think to yourself, terrified of your new, deadly situation.

"Here I come, puny toy!" The boy scowled down, doing his best to make an angry, mean face. To a normal person, he'd look cute, innocent, using his imagination to play with his toys. To you, however, he was a monster on an incomprehensible scale. It was maddening to think that this little boy, who probably would have only reached your chest a day ago, now towered over you like a titan. You ran across the hardwood floor, towards that door. Who cares if he had a dog, you had to escape. You had to get out. So close. You could make it! You could-*SLAM*

Joey's foot came down on top of you. Searing pain ran through your body. The boy had broken bones. "This can't be happening!" You think to yourself. "It can't end like this! I was going to be famous! I was going to be rich!" You cried in your mind. Tears welled up in your eyes as the pressure of the foot bared down on you.

Relief came, but only for a moment. The boy lifted his foot high into the air again. You couldn't move though. You couldn't get away. Joey looked down at you, strange feelings running through his mind. He had a real, life tiny person at his feet. He had played this game with his toys before, but they were plastic, lifeless. This was different. He knew what he was doing was wrong. But, he had always loved crushing bugs. Whenever the young boy would see an ant, he'd always get a kick out of stomping on it. This was a whole new level. This tiny adult was powerless at his foot. Nobody would ever know what happened to him. He could do whatever he wanted with this "toy". Joey smiled as the power went to his head.

"You lose, I win! Time to go squish!" Joey said coldly. You lay on the floor, your end hovering above you. All you wanted to do was improve the world. You never thought you would end up under a little boy's foot, like a common ant. And the worst part was, you had done this to yourself. Your careless experiment had landed you in this situation, and now, you were paying the price. You looked up at the boy's hovering foot, the smile on his boyish face, the gleam in his eye. You began to cry. "No, not like this! Plea-" But you never got a chance to finish your words. Joey's foot came down, instantly bringing an end to your life.

The boy lifted his foot, and examined the bottom of his sock. "Whoooah..." He said, one more time before his mother called him down for dinner.
1111121.title: Play Time

11112.content:
The boy continued to process the situation until there was a change in his expression.

When he initially reached in to grab you, he was thinking "I want him", but even now after learning who you are, he realizes that nothing has changed; he could still very well HAVE you.

A weird looking smile slowly formed on the boy's face.

One look and you knew something wasn't right.

You tried to keep your balance as he brought his giant hand back up to eye level.

"You'd make a fun toy.." He spoke with amusement and wonder.

Your heart started to pound as you realized that this kid had no intention of letting you go. It was even more terrifying when you thought to put yourself in his position. You imagined all the things any regular brat would do if they found a tiny person all for themselves.

"L-look kid! I really need you to help me out here!" You begged, hoping that there was a part of the boy that could empathize with you.

He didn't even seem to have been listening, instead he was staring off ahead, almost as if he was planning out all the things he would do with you.

As you stood there, you remembered the portal down below. You were desperate to get out of this situation by any means possible. Slowly, you side-stepped to the side of the hand, hoping to see if the portal was within jumping distance.

It was a stretch, but if you got a running start, it might be possible.

Taking a deep breath, you readied yourself to sprint when the hand suddenly jolted, causing you to fall over.

(Damn it!)

While you were staring down at the portal, so was Joey.

He knew that he probably wouldn't be able to keep you a secret with the portal there. His parents would surely notice it and ask questions. As the boy thought about it, a lightbulb suddenly went off in his head.

The world around you spun as Cody turned around. You braced yourself as he brought his hand down to a nearby picnic chair, dumping you off onto the hard wooden surface.

The scent of pine hit you hard as you rolled off the palm with a thud. You watched as the giant turned back around and walked over to the fence by the portal.

"What is he..?" You stared with confusion as the boy picked up a large stone, about the size of a melon.

The blood drained out of your face as you realized what he was going to do.

"No......NOOOOO!! STOP!!! PLEASEEE!!" You screamed despite being too small and far away to be heard.

Looming over the portal like a building, the boy brought the stone over it.

"DON'T!!! PLEASE I!---" You screamed in utter desperation.

With a playfully innocent smile, Joey released the stone, sending it plummeting into the portal.

There was a loud metallic crunch quickly followed by a fizzle as the portal vanished out of thin air. Simultaneously, your house nextdoor momentarily shook from the impact of the resized stone.

You fell to your knees in anguish. Not only was years of work lost, but so was your only way of getting back to regular size.

Joey turned around to face you, now grinning from ear to ear like a kid who won a prize.

As you stared down at the rough wooden surface, you could feel the vibrations of the boy's foot steps getting stronger until a shadow fell over you.

"Mine now!" The booming boyish voice above you spoke with finality.

You looked up in horror to see his hand opened wide, ready to grab you again. Only this time, for good.
11112.title: Joey wants to keep you a secret

choices: Joey eventually gets tired of you and crushes you under his huge sole.
Joey decides to keep you as his foot slave forever.
111121.content:
Joey grabs you and smirks like the evil kid he is. He goes into the house and enters his room, closing th door behind him. He sits on the floor, grinning happily at his new tiny toy. He kicks off his shoes and pulls off his socks.
"What are you doing...?" you say, in complete fear of the young God before you.
"How would you like to smell my feet?" he laughs, clearly enjoying owning and controlling you. Joey grabs you and presses your tiny, frail body against his huge bare toes, while wiggling them all over you. You squirm in his grasp but are helpless. He laughs at your weakness and smiles sadisticly. After a few minutes of suffocating you with his toes, Joey decides to introduce you to the rest of his feet. He grabs you and lays you flat on the ground.
"Say hello to my sole!" he smiles happily as he lowers his foot onto you. His massive bare sole presses on top of you, squishing you flat against the floor.
"K-kid...please...stop!" you shout weakly out from under his powerful sole.
"Haven't you figured it out yet? I own you now. This is your new life. I'll never listen to you; and no one will ever find you!" he laughs, smirking devilishly as he wiggles his massive toes all over your tiny body. The smell is overpowering, and you are now drenched in his foot sweat. He stops for a second, grabs you, and puts you between his massive boy soles. He then mercilessly rubs and presses you between them while laughing. Joey is enjoying himself much more than he had ever imagined. Suddenly Joey's Mom enters the home and calls him downstairs. Joey smirks evilly. He grabs you and scrunches you up between his toes. Then he pulls his sock back on over you, trapping you up with his toes. His socks are white with gray toes and heels, and as he wiggles his toes on you the gray fabric bulges around you. He pulls his other sock back on and wiggles his toes comfortably in his socks, knowing you are being smooshed by his toes. He takes a step forward, and you are pushed against Joey's huge godly toes, but are not crushed because you are in the gap. Joey smiles as he goes out to greet his Mom, with his new foot slave suffering under his massive, powerful toes.
111121.title: Joey's Slave

choices: Two trips through the same portal have consequences for you...
11113.content:
Still a bit in shock about what just happened, you tried to calm down. It's alright, everything will be sorted out, this kid will help you for sure, you told him about the situation, how it would close every second, and that you needed to go back. You told him, that you were his neighbor, that you knew his parents. He will help you for sure. Just calm down...

You looked up to the boys face, and it seemed the kid was still thinking through really hard what to do. After a few seconds of no reaction, your fear grew bigger again, that the portal could close any second, and that your only chance of becoming normal size would just vanish out of existence, that it would just pop like a balloon.

If that scenario would happen, how would you even ever get big again? You would need to tell the kid to go to your house, explain how to use the computer and open a new portal. Would that even work? If it was a new portal and not the same you came through the first way? What if the size of the new portal wouldn't be the same like this one? Wait, how would the kid even get into your house without a key? And even worse, didn't you lock the door to the ceiling for the experiment!?

Your mind was floating with questions after questions, and you became more frightened every second.

Out of a sudden your desperate thoughts were interrupted though by Joey, just like the picture of that popping portal if you would stab a needle inside a bloated balloon: “Alright little guy, I'll help you. You said you need to go back through that... mirror thingy, right?”.

A little bit confused but totally relieved, you answered him instantly, “Yes! Please hurry, the portal could close any moment, please just hold your hand in front of the portal and I...”.

You weren't able to finish your sentence, because just right after you spoke your last word, Joey closed his fist around you, and everything became dark. “Hey wait, what are you doing kid!?” You shouted out loud, but none of your words seemed to reach the kid outside.

“Don’t worry little guy, I'll get you back inside your shrunken home in no time!”, hearing Joey speaking you rolled your eyes, didn't that kid listen to you? “I'm your neighbor, kid, I wasn't this size a few moments ago, it's because of the experiment”. But again, Joey didn't hear you, or he wasn't interested in what you said, because you suddenly felt the ground, or actually Joeys hand to accelerator. He was moving it towards the portal!

And outside Joey was about to do exactly that. He had closed his first around the tiny man, looked at the mirror thingy and began to move his hand through, just like he did before.

The moment his hand passed the portal, you felt a tingling all around your body, and you knew you were back in your own ceiling! An instant float of endorphin was sent through your body, you felt relieved and just happy nothing bad had happened, and that you were save again, back where all started.

“Alright kid, you can open your first now and let me...”, ~RING~, “...wait, what was that??”. ~RING~

Joey had just put his hand through the portal and was about to open his fist, when he felt his cell phone vibrate in his jeans back pocket.

Because he had used his left hand for putting the little man back inside the portal, he could use his right hand to snatch back inside his jeans pocket and take out the ringing cell phone. Everything would have been fine and OK, if Joey had just opened his left hand, let go of the tiny man, put his hand out of the portal, and answered his phone.

But the boy was much more interested in answering the call than thinking about the tiny man he was still holing in his left hand. And because he was kneeling on the ground, he drew his left hand out of the portal, with the tiny guy still inside, reached with his right hand inside his back pocket, and stood up for answering the call.
11113.title: Alright little guy, I'll help you...

choices: You are now the size of an ant
111131.content:
Knowing already this was over, that you were safe again and most important, that you were back to your normal size, you sighted in relieve.

Though still caught inside the closed hand of this kid who mostly lived in the same street like you did, he had not opened it yet. But that didn't matter much to you, in a few seconds he would open his hand, and you would be back where this had started, and you could start working on your great discovery again.

“Damn...”, you said to yourself in the dark but also warm environment of the boys hand, which surrounded you and all of your view. Actually it did that much, that you couldn't even see a thing, and the dim light of your ceiling was also adding to this dilemma a lot.

“I'm so glad nothing serious happened, he... he he”, you laughed a little bit in a weird way, thinking again about all the crazy thoughts you just had a few moments ago, going through all those things which might could have happened, and what you should have done if the portal just closed before you were back through.

“Alright kid, you can open your hand now and let me...”, ~RING~, “...wait, what was that??”. ~RING~

Just as Joey was about to open his left hand and let the 'tiny' man out, his cell phone began to ring.

“Oh! Who's that?!”, the boy asked out to himself with a kind of interested but also annoyed tone.

~RING~ … ~RING~ …

The sudden and surprising ringing sound of his own phone caused the boy to nearly lose his balance, where he was just kneeling in front of that weird mirror thingy, his left hand still stretched out through, and his body slightly moving towards the portal.

With his left hand still inside, the boy tried to take a hold of his ringing and vibrating phone, which was in his jeans back pocket, but he wasn't quite successful.

After the fifth ~RING~, Joey came to the conclusion that he better had to stand up, so he could grasp inside his jeans back pocket more easily and take the phone out, where now it was just too difficult for him. His jeans was stretched too tight to his butt, because of him kneeling in front of he portal and so sealing the phone inside the pocket.

But also because of him balancing and stretching out his hand. Though everything would have worked perfectly, no harm done, the 'tiny' guy back where he lived obviously, just if Joey had opened his hand, before moving it out, again... And sending the 'tiny' guy inside on a second trip through the portal.

Joey wanted to answer his phone right away, that was everything which counted in this very moment. The caller could hang every second!!

The tight denim jeans slightly loosed up, just after Joey stood to his full size. While standing up, he just removed his hand from the portal of course, hanging now relaxed beside his tummy, still closed to a fist.

Joeys clever acting worked perfectly, and his right hand could easily grasp inside his back pocket. Another ~RING~ later, mostly just in time before the caller was about to hang up, Joey had his cell phone inside his right hand, looking on the display who the caller was.

“Jeez...”, he moaned after reading the word 'MOM' on his phones display. Making a pissed like face expression, sticking out his tongue a little bit, Joey pressed the power button and brought the phone to his right ear.

“What do you want mom...”, while talking to his mother, the boy's eyes caught the still opened portal, now looking down to it again, where it was just a few inches under his knees.

“Yeah, yeah, fine, I will come home in about a minute...”, “ ...jeez.”, totally pissed about that he had to go home already that early, Joey put his phone back inside his jeans pocket.

The boy, now in an annoyed mood, was just about to leave the yard and walk the few steps home, when he remembered that he had still this weird tiny little guy in his left hand: “Ohhh... right! Hee, sorry little guy, totally forgot about you! Wait let me put you back insi...” ~POP~ “... oops.”

Joey couldn't finish his sentence though, because just after he had spoken his last word, the strange looking mirror thingy imploded in an instant, and while doing that, making a sound like a popping bubblegum.

The boy removed his view of where the portal just had been the last few minutes, and brought his left hand in front of his tummy, looking down to it: “Whooa, dude...!!”, Joey said while opening his fist, “....that was ...sooo ...Cooool!! ...Did you see that!?”...
111131.title: Two trips through the same portal have conseque...

114.content:
Two blocks away, in a typical neighborhood vacant lot, two twelve year old boys were playing catch. The lot was mostly empty, aside from two trees near the tall wooden fence that enclosed it. The ground in the middle of the area was covered mostly with dirt; likely caused by kids consistently playing sports on it. The parameter of the lot was the only area that had grass.

The sun was high and the nearby road was quiet. The two boys had been visiting the lot every day to play catch and enjoy the summer.

Andrew wiped a bit of sweat from his forehead before catching the oncoming baseball in his mitt. The boys were going to be entering the eighth grade after summer was over.

A flapping sound came from Ryan's mitt as he caught the incoming ball. He pinched and the front of his shirt and brought it up to his face to dry off the sweat that had been accumulating on his face.

"Dude, wanna take a break? I'm thirsty" Ryan panted

"Yeah, sounds good" Andrew had just been ready to ask the same thing.

The boys walked over to the nearby wooden fence where they had placed their water bottles.

"Guuuhh~" Ryan muttered as he collapsed onto the ground, resting his back up against the fence.

"It's really hot to day, huh?" Andrew followed suit.

"Yeah, but at least it's not raining." Ryan retorted

"That's true" Andrew replied before guzzling down the water from his bottle

*gulp gulp* "Gahhhhhh~" the pre-teen loudly hissed.

"So, what do you wanna do after this?" Andrew asked as he brushed aside his sweaty bangs.

"I dunno...Wanna come over and play that new game I got?" Ryan replied

"Yeah sure. A little AC would be great~"

Not long after the two friends stood up and began to head out of the lot, Ryan noticed something odd over towards the baseball diamond where they had just been playing.

"Wait...Dude, what the heck is that???" Ryan extended out his right arm in front of his friend's chest, halting him in place.

"Huh?? What's what?" Andrew asked, as he looked towards the direction his friend was pointing to.

There was something odd floating about a foot off the ground between home base and the pitcher's mound.

Whatever it was, it appeared flat and disk shaped, and it was surrounded by a strange blue glow.

"Wooooah. What the hell is that???" Andrew muttered as he and Ryan hesitantly began walking over towards the mysterious object.

---

Meanwhile in the lab...
114.title: Vacant lot

1141.content:
The light of the sun suddenly lit up the metallic lab, causing the various reflective surfaces to glitter and gleam. It didn't take long before the hot, humid outside air invaded the once dry, air conditioned space. The pungent scent of grass and weeds soon followed.

The blinding light of the hot beaming sun caused Jeremy to shield his eyes.

Though this was all one big unintentional consequence, you did find relief in that the portal was successfully functional.

The main problem was that you didn't know where the portal was. It would be disastrous if the portal appeared on a sidewalk or road where people or cars might accidentally fall through.

Turning back to the monitor, Jeremy attempted to close the portal before anything bad could happen. As he were typing away at the console, something suddenly fluttered down from over his head and landed over his hands.

"Huh..?" Jeremy stopped what he was doing and grabbed the stalk-end of the strange foot-long . At first it almost appeared to be a flower of some kind. However, rather than pedals, it appeared to be sprouting white fibrous hairs, almost like cat whiskers.

As he examined it closer, it finally occurred to him what he was holding in his hand. It was an over-sized dandelion seed, probably a foot or so long. The very same kind he used to watch float away in the wind after blowing on dandelion puffs as a kid. He would have recognized it immediately if not for it's unusually large size.

"Wait..how?... that's not..." Jeremy began to mutter in confusion.

As Jeremy pondered what he was looking at, the harsh sunlight in his lab suddenly faded. He initially assumed that a cloud had just drifted across the sun, but then you remembered that it had been a clear day.

"Wooaah what the hell is this????" A loud boyish voice boomed from the portal above.

Jeremy nervously turned his head and looked upward. His whole body went ridged with shock as he was confronted by a gigantic young face.

"W-what the?!"

So many questions flooded Jeremy's mind as he stared back at the huge face; The giant boy's puzzled expression seemed to reflect his own. Something was obviously wrong here. Something was VERY wrong.

It was as if the portal over his head was a movie theater screen that made an actors face look many times larger than it really was. Just as Jeremy was about to call out to the boy, another giant pre-teen appeared next to him, nudging the other boy to the side.

"WOOOAAAH, Let me see, let me see!" The second boy spoke.

It was then that everything clicked.

He gasped as he turned towards the screen.

"Oh god" he realized that the secondary portal was still minimized by 900%

Regardless of how weird he knew it would sound to the boys, Jeremy began to shout up to them.

"B-boys!, get away from here! It's dangerous!" he yelled. He had not fully tested the risks of getting too close to the secondary portal while in a completed state. For all he knew, it could seriously harm the boys if they came too close to its glowing edges.

His words seemed to fall on deaf ears however.

He watched as the first boy brought his face closer to the portal. You stared up in utter astonishment as the giant twelve year old's face encompassed the entire ceiling. You could actually feel his light breathing against your entire body. You quickly recognized the scent of what smelled like Gatorade on his breath.

"Kid please! You could get hurt! Back away!" You frantically shouted up at the enormous face above you.

The young boy seemed to almost be ignoring you as his eyes scanned the room around you.

Finally, his eyes focused on to you, sending an unnerving chill down your spine.


"Wooaaaaaaaaah" The giant kid muttered.


"Let me see! Let me see!" The face was pulled away, only to be replaced by the face of the second boy, who was clearly way more excited by their discovery.

This boy was lot more intimidating. Jeremy's legs almost started to tremble as you watched the boy's eyes rapidly bounce up down left and right.

"WHAT IS THIS THING?!" A few drips of saliva unintentionally splattered out of his mouth and onto the floor next to the small scientist.

Jeremy realized communication wasn't an option. He quickly ran back up to his computer and began to type as fast as he could. The quicker you could get this portal shut, the less chance that something bad could happen.

----
The portal floated a little lower than the boy's chests , allowing them to peer inside floating disk. Ryan's face was so close that his nose had actually partially entered the other space. He lifted his head and turned to Andrew. It's like a tiny room! And there's a tiny man moving inside!!" The boy exclaimed excitedly.

"But where did it come from?" Andrew couldn't help but ponder.

"Who knows?" Ryan didn't seem to care. Turning back to the hole, the boy pulled his sweaty hand out of his catcher's mitt and began to reach into the circle.

"Wait! Dude! What if it's dangerous?" Andrew warned.

Ryan hesitated for a moment before ultimately giving into curiosity.
1141.title: In your lab

11411.content:
There! You shout in triumph. You had just initiated the closing program of the portal. Just as you were about to let out a humongous sigh of relief, a huge red error appeared on screen.

[Cannot close due to obstruction]

"Obstruction?" You turned around and became pale with fear. Behind you was an enormous hand.

"Oh my god" You watched as the giant glistening hand poked and prodded at the many wires and components of the room.

"No! Please don-t do that! Please! You need to back away from the portal!

"Huh?" Ryan seemed to notice your tiny voice. The curious twelve year old stared at you passed his wrist.

Just as you were about to repeat your request, the palm of the giant hand suddenly turned towards you.

"H-hey!" You watched fearfully as the large palm came closer. It was visibly covered with a layer of sweat.

"No!" You attempted push it away, causing you to actually make contact with the giant sweaty hand. The enormous thick fingers closed around you, pulling you into the warm wet surface, lifting you up off your feet.

"PLEASE NO!! LET ME GO!! STOOOOP!!"
------
Ryan appeared as if he was in awe as he pulled his coiled fist out of the strange hole.

[Obstruction cleared, Initiating closing sequence]

To both of the boy's shock, the strange hole vanished the moment Ryan pulled his hand away.

"That was weird..." Andrew muttered, not sure of how to make sense of what they just saw.

Ryan just stood there silently, staring at his fist.

"What is that?" Andrew asked, pointing at his best friends enclosed hand.

The boy opened his fingers, revealing the tiny man.

"Coooooool~"

Both boys brought their excited faces close, eager to examine their new capture.
11411.title: Worse

114111.content:
Your heart was racing as the fingers pulled away. Under you was a smooth fleshy surface. You knew what it was, but you couldn’t comprehend that you were actually on the palm of someone’s hand. Everything was happening so fast. You looked up at the horrifying sight of the same two boys, only this time, their faces weren’t behind a window. They were up close and their expressions seemed to gush with excitement and wonder.

Backing up, nervously, you crawled up to where the boy’s fingers began. You stared down passed them to see what looked like a 100 ft fall.

“W-what a minute..” You nervously searched for the portal. It wasn’t anywhere to be seen.

“Nonono..” You realized that the computer must have closed it automatically.

“DAMN IT!” You shouted in frustration and fear.

“WHAT DO YOU THINK HE IS?” Ryan asked

“What I am? I’m a human!” You quickly tried to get to your feet . You need these boys to realize that you’re not just some plaything, or things could turn ugly.

“I’M HUMAN!!”

“Did he just speak..?” Ryan muttered

“Y-yeah, and I think he says he’s a human” Andrew added

“But HOW?” Ryan watched the tiny man struggle to stay balanced on his hand. He couldn’t help but find it mildly amusing. Purposely, he jittered his hand a bit, causing the man to fall. Ryan laughed at this a bit.

“B-boys! Hey I need you to take me to your parents!”

“What did he say?” Ryan asked

“I think he said we need to tell our parents” Andrew answered

“YES!’ You shouted at the boy in the red shirt. As far as you can tell, the boy in red seemed a lot more mature and dependable than the one in the blue.

Noticing the man’s reaction, Andrew understood he had gotten it right.

Ryan didn’t seem to care though, he too busy making the tiny man as uncomfortable as possible.

Andrew thought for a moment, his house was only two houses away from the lot, and he knew his mom was home. Ryan’s house was much farther away, and his mom was out grocery shopping.

“Alright, let’s take him to my house” Andrew spoke

Ryan stayed silent, but nodded his head.

Cusping his hands shut, the two boys began to run towards Andrew’s house. Ryan smiled as he made sure the ride was as bumpy as possible for you. Something about feeling your tiny struggles in his hand brought the boy great entertainment.

The boys slowed down as they reached Andrew’s porch.

“My mom’s probably in the kitchen, let’s go”

“Wait….” Ryan spoke.

“You know….. we don’t really have’tah tell your mom…”

“Wait what?” Andrew turned around, looking confused.

“I mean.. we could… you know…KEEP him if we wanted..”

Inside the hot sweaty confines of the boy’s hand, your heart began to pound with anxiety. Deep down, you knew this boy didn’t want to give you up. You could only hope that the other boy would be rational.

“Dude… what are you saying? He’s a person” Andrew spoke.

You sighed with relief. All you really desire right now is to get out of this boy’s hand.

The fingers around you suddenly opened. Your whole body was wet with the boy’s palm sweat.

“Yeah, but I mean, look at him!” Ryan continued. “No one knows we have him….. Think about the fun we could have!” The boy grinned mischievously.

Andrew stared down at you with genuine concern.

You gestured in desperation towards the boy in red, you knew he was pretty much your only way out of this situation.
“I don’t think this is right dude….” Andrew tried to dissuade his friend.

“Common! Here! You hold him!” The Ryan pulled his friends arm up, turning the palm up and carefully dumping you on.
You sighed with relief “Thank god…”. You’d rather not be in anyone’s hand, but you’re grateful to be with someone who seems to actually care about your well-being.

“See?! Doesn’t that feel awesome?” Ryan’s persuasion continued; nudging the other boy’s hand, causing you to fall over again.

A small smile formed on the Andrew’s face for a brief moment. He couldn't deny it, that WAS kinda entertaining .

“Yeah, Okay, I guess it’s kinda cool… but still...” The boy quickly fought off the desire.

Ryan quickly cut him off.

“Just think of all the stuff we could do! We could keep him like a pet and play with him every day!”

Andrew’s stared down at you, deep in thought…..his parents never DID let him have a pet before…

You stared up worryingly at the boy in the red teeshirt. You could see it in his expression, he was starting to cave.

“Please! I need your help! Take me to your mom! Please!” You cried out desperately, trying to draw out the empathy the boy was expressing earlier.

“Think of it! An adult that has to do everything we say!” Ryan continued

…….

“……well…. maybe it would be cool if we kept him for…just a little while…” Andrew’s eyes glimmered with newfound cruelty as he smiled.

Andrew brought up his other hand and began to hesitantly poke you with his index finger. He couldn’t help but giggle as it knocked you over.

“Hey, should take him up to my room?" The Andrew asked

As darkness began to engulf you, the last thing you saw were the two young boys grinning down at you.
114111.title: Help

114112.content:
You felt really weird and weak, and for a moment you feared you would black out. The heat radiating from all around you, the lack of light, the compressed room, but wait, weren't the walls around you way more closer to you a few seconds ago?

What happened, where am I, you reasoned for a moment then it hit you again, the two boys, one of them had reached his hand inside the portal and, he enclosed it around you, yes? ... Did he pull also it out of the portal, together with you!!?

“Hello!?”, you shouted a little bit nervous and still with a weak voice, “Kid, please open your fist, it's dangerous!!”.

Nothing.

Maybe I have to shout louder, “HELLO!? PLEASE LE...”.

Suddenly light streamed into your prison from all around you, yes yes! The boy must have heard you and let you out again.

Still sitting on your butt and holding your hands in front of your eyes to block the bright light, you tried to focus on something. When the vision got cleared things came into view and you spoke with relieved voice, “Geez, for a moment I though you had...”.

You stopped your sentence just as you realized something was horribly wrong. You weren't in your lab anymore. Bright sunlight was hitting your face! You were... outside?

Near to panic you looked around, the surface you were sitting on looked really strange. Skin-colored, and with, weird looking, arm wide grooves embedded into it.

“No, no..., am I still in the boys hand? But why does it look so different, what happened!?”.

Suddenly a huge shadow fell over you, making your vision also much better. Slowly you rose your head, with a very sick feeling in your backbone. “No... this cant be.”, you noticed your face becoming pale, and you gulped with a dry mouth.

----

Ryan just stood there silently, staring at his hand.

“What is it?” Andrew asked, pointing at his best friends opened hand.

“Dude, that's weird...”, “I thought there was a tiny person inside that thingy”, “wait a second, let me give it a closer look.”

Bringing his hand closer to his eyes, the boy tried to focus on the tiny object lying in the middle of his hand. It was a little bit smaller than an ant, actually it looked exactly like an ant to the boy.

Impatience grew bigger and bigger inside of Andrew, looking at his best friend who tried to figure out what he had just brought back out of that weird portal, which wasn't there anymore.

“What is it!?”, Andrew asked again, this time stepping closer to Ryan, and also moving his head close to his best friends palm.

Andrew had his eyes focused on Ryan’s face to figure out if it was something of interest his friend was holding in his hand, or maybe just something totally ordinary, something totally boring..., something, like a bug.

Not getting an answer, he moved his eyes too on the little something laying in the middle of his best friends hand.

What were the two boys looking at?
114112.title: Reader's Choice

choices: The boys take the 'bug person' home...
1141121.content:
“What is it? Is that a bug?”, looking at the tiny little debris in his friends hand, Andrew moved one of his fingers closer to the little something, which obviously was some sort of tiny insect.

“I am still trying to figure it out man, but there's something looking very odd about this thing.”, Ryan said while moving his right eye closer and closer towards his hand.

“Dude you’re lame. Here let me show you something fun.”, while saying this Andrew started to smile ironically and began to move one of his fingers towards the little bug.

“There's only one thing bugs are good for, going squish!”

Just a few inches before Andrew's finger was about to touch the tiny bug, Ryan moved his hand away from his friends reach and yelled at him, “What the fuck are you doing, moron!?”.

Turning the smile into a sarcastic one, Andrew answered, “Relax man, it's just a... bug.”, and while spelling the word 'bug', he made a movement like blowing air towards his friends face.

“No it's not!”

“Dude, what you mean 'no it's not', of course it is, look how tiny it is, I can barley see it on your hand.”, Andrew moved a step closer towards his friend who was still holding his hand away from him, and with one of his own hands he reached out with a fast move towards his friends.

“You're lame dude, show me your hand. Give me that fucking bug!”

“I told you it's not a bug you idiot!”, shouting at his friend Ryan suddenly lowered his voice and added, “...it's... it's a tiny person.”

The moment his best friend said the words 'tiny person', Andrew lost his smile and also the interest in 'bugging' around with his friend.

“Dude, are you nuts?”, Andrew stepped away form his friend and giving him a weird looking expression while at the same time bending his head slightly to the right.

“No, I told you, I saw a tiny person inside that thingy... and I reached for it, but...”.

“But... what?!”, Andrew spitted at his friend with a harsh tone.

“But... it looked... much bigger from outside. And now... now it's just so damn tiny. Here, look for yourself if you don't believe me.”, and with that Ryan brought his hand back in between the two boys, and both stared at it in silence.

“You're nut...”, Andrew was about to tell his best friend after a few seconds, but then his jaw dropped.

“... whoa...”, still not believing his friend, Andrews eyes had moved closer to the little bug, but then he had seen something strange.

The bug was wearing... clothes? And had, arms? Which it seemed to... hold over his head, like protecting itself?

And it was cowering on the floor. Or actually on his friends hand.

“Duuuude... ! That's a freaking tiny person! Coooool!!”

“I told you moron. Who's nuts now?”

“Uhmm yeah, sorry about that. But whoooa look at it...”

With total surprise and uprising new joy, Andrew brought one of his fingers again towards the tiny 'bug', and was about to touch, or actually nearby, crushing it.

“What the fuck are you doing man!”, moving his hand back, Ryan yelled at his friend, “You're scaring it, can't you see that?”

“Uhm, no. Sorry little guy.”, this time talking directly to the little bug person, Andrew smiled sheepishly and rubbed with one hand at the back of his head.

“Don't be stupid.”

“What?”, Andrew lowered his hand again, “What did I do wrong now?”

“Isn't it obvious?”

“Uhm no?? ... What are you talking about??”

“Jeez... it cannot understand what you're saying man.”

“And why would that be?”, Andrews eyes looked down on his friends hand while his head didn't move.

“You moron... a little creature that tiny!? Hello?? It would have the brain the size of a fucking fly! You ever saw a talking fly before, genius?”

“Uhm... no.”, Andrew looked confused, "... but..."

"No but."

Andrew rubbed at his head again... “Yeah, maybe... that sounds reasonable.”

“Of course it does.”, Ryan smiled and while saying that, closed his eyes.

He felt good about how he came up with such a clever movement. He liked the idea of sounding like a clever person in front of his best friend.

“But why does it wear clothes, and where does it come from?”, Andrew said still with a confused look, his eyes focused on Ryan's hand.

“Wait, what?”, Ryan lost his smile and opened his eyes.

“Uhm, well...”, trying to find a logic sounding conclusion to the good point his friend came up with, he never found one. Actually it was his friend himself who 'answered' his own question.

“Maybe someone put tiny miniature clothes on it? Like how you would on a dog or any other pet?”

“Uhm, of course. Someone must have found it before and for fun made its own little clothes, so it would look like a real person!”

“Yeah... but where does it come from?”, Andrew moved his eyes towards his friend, which shared the glance.

“Doesnt matter”, Ryan said in a short way and started to smile, then lowering his view back towards his hand, and also brought it a little bit higher into the air, while at the same time both boys moved their heads toward it, “It's ours... now.”
1141121.title: It's an ant sized person!

115.content:
Meanwhile, in the back yard of the house to your left

Whimpering could be heard within the fenced in yard of your neighbor. Pawing at the back door was their young golden labrador retriever, pleading to be let back inside. Fortunately, he was a well trained dog and rarely ever barked. A lot of the time, you would completely forget that your neighbors were even dog owners at all.

Sadly for Jojo, his owner was playing video games in his room upstairs with the volume up to maximum. The teen was supposed to let his dog back in twenty minutes ago so he could eat.

The poor hungry pup continued to whimper and paw until he eventually gave up. With little else to do, the lab turned around began his usual lap around the parameter of the yard, sniffing around for anything new or interesting.

Around half way across the back fence, Jojo's ears perked. He had caught onto a scent!

With his nose to the ground, the dog began sniffing away rapidly, attempting to pin point the mystery scent's location.

Little did the dog realize, only a few meters away from where he was walking, a small disk shaped hole floated a mere three inches off the ground.

------

You continued typing away, attempting to fix the bug and move on with your experiment. You still couldn't believe that you made such a stupid typo at such a crucial moment.

You only had about a minute worth of keystrokes left before you began to hear something odd in the distance.

Slowly, you turned your head, tilting it up towards the hole in the ceiling.

"What the heck is that sound?" You whispered to yourself.

It almost sounded like.... helicopter blades? No..

Whatever it was, it was getting louder.

You continued to stare nervously at the ceiling until the sound started to cause your ears discomfort.

Your eyes grew wide as the source of the noise peaked out, high over the edge of the portal. You could hardly make it out, but you could tell it was black, and HUGE. As you attempted to identify it, it lowered itself down closer.

You could feel massive gusts of air fill your lab as it came closer, passing through the portal's barrier.

"Oh no..." Now that you had a good look at it, there was no mistake. The black tip, the two holes pulling and releasing air, the fur.

It was a massive dog muzzle. The rapid gusts of it's breathing caused your lab coat to flutter.

"n-NO! GO AWAY BOY!! SHOO!!" You attempted to deter the dog away. It didn't seem to notice or care as it continued it's investigation of the mysterious 'hole'.

You held your breath in fear as the muzzle sniffed at the metal floor below. You could only pray that it would just lose interest and go away.

To your horror, the dog's mouth opened, revealing it's enormous tongue, glistening with saliva.

The dog began licking away at the floor, creating a sticky pool of saliva on the floor. After a few initial licks, the muzzle began to move across the lab, as if to make sure it licked the place clean.

You stood there in front of your monitor, frozen in fear as the massive maw began to lick towards your direction.

You quickly ran to the left, slipping across a freshly made puddle of slobber.

You looked back to see the tongue ravenously licking away at where you had just been standing. Suddenly, the dog paused. He smelled something else....

No longer licking, the nose quickly began to sniff towards your direction.

You couldn't help but panic as the muzzle began to track you.

As you desperately attempted to escape, you suddenly slipped.

Your immediate reaction was to pull yourself up, but before you could even move...

Already above you were the huge black nostrils, flaring opened and closed as they identified their target. You stared up in fear as the pressure of it's sniffing pushed you down, lightly tugging you up with each exhale.

You screamed as the dog's tongue lolled out of it's gigantic maw, beginning to lap away at you.

"NOOOO!!!!" You cried as you tried to beat away the slimy tasting muscle. Fighting it proved meaningless now that your size was 1/100th the dogs.

Your whole body was now covered with layers upon layers of the dog's slobber. With each lick, you felt your cohesion to the tongue get stronger and stronger..until...

"AAAaaaaaa!!!!" You cried as you found yourself unable to pull away from the tongue as it began to pull back into the dog's mouth. You could feel it's hot breath wash over you before it's mouth closed shut with a wet slap.

-------
Jojo pulled his head out of the strange hole he found, gulping the one and only treat he could find inside it.

"Jojo! Come on! Time to eat!" Jojo's owner called him from the backdoor.

Excitedly, the golden lab ran back to the house. It might have been small, but it's not every day he got to enjoy an appetizer.
115.title: Somewhere in a different yard

choices: A boy he used to babysit
12.content:
The massive hatch on the floor began to open with a loud low grind. A bright light shined through the space between the metal doors as they split from each other. As the space between them grew larger, it was easier to make out the bluish swirling vortex that was slowly filling up the floor like a raging pond. With a thud, the doors finished opening to completion.

“Looking good so far..” The excited scientist muttered as he stared down at the incredible portal.

His next task was to create a secondary portal to connect it with. With his control monitor, he could create another ‘portable’ portal anywhere within a mile radius. In order to test-view the second portal properly within his lab, he needed to make it significantly smaller than the ‘home’ portal; He simply hadn’t accommodated enough room for a third full sized portal within the relatively small space.

After entering the specific coordinates, he slapped the enter key.

Nearly a foot away from him, foot-long circular portal appeared before him. With its arrival, the swirling [home] vortex across the floor suddenly went still; almost as if the waves of the raging pond were suddenly made flat as a mirror. The two portals had been connected. As he stared into the smaller portal in front of him, It was almost as if he was looking at a monitor that was recording the entire lab from below.

“Amazing…..It really worked. It’s a success!” The scientist was beside himself with pride.

In all the excitement, the scientist quickly flooded with the desire to show someone the results of his hard work!
12.title: Tests the floor portal

choices: Teleport to somewhere Cody won't initially notice the portal
Teleport to somewhere Cody will notice the portal
121.content:
You pondered for a few moments, thinking about anyone nearby that you'd be able to show. It was a shame that the distance you could send the temporary portal was limited, otherwise you'd surprise one of your professors.

It was then that you remembered a boy that you used to babysit when you were in highschool. His name was Cody. You quickly did the math in your head to figure out how old he had to be now. Probably around early middle school.

You thought to yourself what a great a surprise it would be if you were to suddenly create a full-sized secondary portal over his head while he was playing basketball in his driveway. You imagined the shock on his face when he would see you waving to him from a random hole in space.

The more you thought about it, the more exciting the idea became.

You quickly left your lab and ran to a window in the front of your house.

To your great disappointment, Cody was walking into his house with a basketball under his arm. YOU JUST MISSED HIM

"Awwh maaaaan! Really?" You whined.

You were really looking forward to it too. You combed your fingers through your hair and sighed.

"......No." You suddenly spoke with a determined tone.

You were going to do this, one way or another. You were not going to give up on this surprise.

You didn't know when he would leave his house again, and you didn't intend to stare out your window until he did.

"maybe.... oh!" A thought hit you.

You ran back down to your lab. As soon as you walked through the door, you saw the secondary portal, still floating there from earlier.

"If I keep it this size, I'll be able to teleport it in his house!"
121.title: A boy he used to babysit

1211.content:
